item.title: 《Explaining and Generalizing Skip-Gram through Exponential Family Principal Component Analysis》R Cotterell, A Poliak, B V Durme, J Eisner [Johns Hopkins University] (2017)RT @王威廉:推荐一篇来自JHU的EACL 2017论文。Jason Eisner的博士Ryan Cotterell说Word2Vec中SkipGram的本质是EPCA，谷歌公司研究员Michael Collins早在2001年就发明了。Explaining and Generalizing Skip-Gram through Exponential Family Principal Component Analysis论文：http://t.cn/RifJ7xz ​
item.description: 《Explaining and Generalizing Skip-Gram through Exponential Family Principal Component Analysis》R Cotterell, A Poliak, B V Durme, J Eisner [Johns Hopkins University] (2017) RT @王威廉:推荐一篇来自JHU的EACL 2017论文。Jason Eisner的博士Ryan Cotterell说Word2Vec中SkipGram的本质是EPCA，谷歌公司研究员Michael Collins早在2001年就发明了。Explaining and Generalizing Skip-Gram through Exponential Family Principal Component Analysis论文：http://t.cn/RifJ7xz ​
